publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2605 Robin Harper: Simon Pepper OBE, Retiral from WWF Scotland—That the Parliament applauds the contribution of Simon Pepper OBE to the environmental movement in Scotland and internationally for the last two decades and more; notes his announcement that he will retire from his post as Director of WWF Scotland in June 2005; recognises his unique contribution which has enabled and inspired many individuals and organisations to take action, not just on environmental policy but right across the sustainable development and public policy agenda, and particularly applauds his widely-respected work in supporting and building initiatives such as Scottish Environment LINK and the Millennium Forest for Scotland and his vigorous efforts to help Scotland become a forward-looking, globally-responsible and sustainable country.

S2M-2605 Simon Pepper OBE, Retiral from WWF Scotland (lodged on 16 March 2005) Richard Lochhead*, Shiona Baird*, Bruce Crawford*, Ms Sandra White*, Patrick Harvie*, Sarah Boyack*, Mr John Swinney*, Mark Ballard*, Tommy Sheridan*, Des McNulty*

S2M-2605 Robin Harper: Simon Pepper OBE, Retiral from WWF Scotland—That the Parliament applauds the contribution of Simon Pepper OBE to the environmental movement in Scotland and internationally for the last two decades and more; notes his announcement that he will retire from his post as Director of WWF Scotland in June 2005; recognises his unique contribution which has enabled and inspired many individuals and organisations to take action, not just on environmental policy but right across the sustainable development and public policy agenda, and particularly applauds his widely-respected work in supporting and building initiatives such as Scottish Environment LINK and the Millennium Forest for Scotland and his vigorous efforts to help Scotland become a forward-looking, globally-responsible and sustainable country. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Shiona Baird, Bruce Crawford, Ms Sandra White, Patrick Harvie, Sarah Boyack, Mr John Swinney, Mark Ballard, Tommy Sheridan, Des McNulty, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-2605 Simon Pepper OBE, Retiral from WWF Scotland (lodged on 16 March 2005) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-2605 Simon Pepper OBE, Retiral from WWF Scotland (lodged on 16 March 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2605 Simon Pepper OBE, Retiral from WWF Scotland (lodged on 16 March 2005) Nora Radcliffe*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Trish Godman*, Rob Gibson*
S2M-2605 Simon Pepper OBE, Retiral from WWF Scotland (lodged on 16 March 2005) Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S2M-2605 Simon Pepper OBE, Retiral from WWF Scotland (lodged on 16 March 2005) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-2605 Simon Pepper OBE, Retiral from WWF Scotland (lodged on 16 March 2005) Maureen Macmillan*
